name: Boss Baby
hint: A baby with a suit and briefcase running a big company.

name: Fast and Furious
hint: High-speed car chases and family bonds.

name: Top Gun
hint: Aerial dogfights with fighter jets.

name: Moana
hint: A young girl sets sail to save her island.

name: The Notebook
hint: A love story written in the pages of a notebook.

name: La La Land
hint: A modern musical about love and dreams in Los Angeles.

name: The Fault in Our Stars
hint: Two teens fall in love while facing terminal illness.

name: It Ends with Us
hint: A heartbreaking journey of love, loss, and new beginnings.

name: Titanic
hint: A doomed love story aboard the ill-fated ship.

name: 500 Days of Summer
hint: The ups and downs of a relationship told in non-linear days.

name: After
hint: A passionate romance with twists and emotional conflicts.

name: 13 Going on 30
hint: A young girl wakes up as a 30-year-old woman in the future.

name: Passengers
hint: Two passengers aboard a spaceship are awakened early.

name: Cruel
hint: A manipulative, twisted love story with dark secrets.

name: Kissing Booth
hint: A teen romance revolving around a high school kissing booth.

name: Companion
hint: A futuristic tale of a robot and a dog dealing with loss.

name: Uncharted
hint: A treasure hunter's adventurous quest filled with danger.

name: Avatar
hint: An alien world, human transformation, and environmental themes.

name: Scooby Doo
hint: A mystery-solving dog and his friends uncover spooky secrets.

name: Miraculous Ladybug
hint: A Parisian superhero duo saves the day, one villain at a time.

name: Train to Busan
hint: A zombie outbreak during a train ride to safety.

name: IT
hint: A killer clown haunts a group of kids in a small town.

name: Human Centipede
hint: A disturbing, grotesque horror film involving twisted science.

name: Planet of the Apes
hint: Apes rule the world after a fall of human civilization.
